page.title: 20MY SATURDAY
page.content: This is a usual Saturday for me.I wake up at about 9.30 am. I get out of bed and go down stairs. I have a bowl of weetabix cereal for{breakfast.}Then I watch{television.}I usually watch Scooby Doo (cartoon series). Sometimes in the morning, if the weather is pleasant, I play tennis with my Father on Winchester College grass courts. Later I go to get our weekly bread from the bakers at St.Cross. Sometimes I go to Eastleigh, usually to buy some sports gear. If I don't go shopping I go to my friend's house to play football, practise athletics or listen to pop records. When I get back I have some{supper,}which is usually pasta, and a cup of tea. I put the radio on so I can listen to some music. Then I watch horror films until 11.00 pm. which is when I go to bed. By Danny Firth (11 year old boy)
